name: KAMOKI
description:
This is a prototype game made for the weekly game jam #128 - camouflage

Game by:  @imnotapan

Music by: @masonacho

Hi thing who is playing this thing,

im the son of a guard you killed on the laboratory, i don't know if you are a human or a mutation but you ruin my life, my family, everything. i know you killed a lot of people and this won't be like that. I H A T E Y O U.

in this game you need to scape from the laboratory, we don't know because you are here, but you can't stay in his place one more moment. 

Controls:

key left and key right for horizontal movement.

key up or space for jump.

"A" for dash and pass through the wall.

"A" for kill a guard if you are in her back,

"S" for camouflage in the boxes of the room.

pd: if you are in the box and the guard is on the front of you, you can press A to kill her.
